mapper.sql: a.id, a.franchisee_id AS franchiseeId, a.banner_name AS bannerName, a.img, a.redirect_url AS redirectUrl, a.is_show AS isShow, a.sort, a.remark
mapper.select: SELECT , b.name AS franchiseeName FROM mtmydb.mtmy_franchisee_banner a LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_franchisee b ON a.franchisee_id = b.id WHERE a.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mtmydb.mtmy_franchisee_banner( franchisee_id, banner_name, img, redirect_url, is_show, sort, remark, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date ) VALUES ( #{franchiseeId}, #{bannerName}, #{img}, #{redirectUrl}, #{isShow}, #{sort}, #{remark}, #{createBy.id}, SYSDATE(), #{createBy.id}, SYSDATE() )
mapper.update: UPDATE mtmydb.mtmy_franchisee_banner SET franchisee_id = #{franchiseeId}, banner_name = #{bannerName}, img = #{img}, redirect_url = #{redirectUrl}, is_show = #{isShow}, sort = #{sort}, remark = #{remark}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = SYSDATE() WHERE id = #{id}
